pages.text:
Aquatica, SeaWorld, and Discovery Cove Job Opportunities
WE'RE HIRING!
Fun Jobs. Amazing Perks.
Are you looking for a job that’s a lot more than just “a job”? Ready to experience incredible rewards while creating lasting memories for others? Want to give great service in a place that takes people’s breaths away? Get ready to experience a fast-paced, fun, one-of-a-kind job at Aquatica!
If you’re looking for the opportunity to make the most of your abilities in a one-of-a-kind setting with an entertainment industry leader, we’re looking for you!
An Ocean of Opportunity to Explore!
Whatever your passion, wherever your area of talent, we want to give you the opportunity to shine with us!
•
Lifeguards (Paid Certification Included!)
•
Culinary Operations
•
Park Operations
•
Security
•
Merchandise
•
Guest Arrivals
Aquatica and Discovery Cove lifeguards - apply now
The Perks of the Position!
As part of the SeaWorld Family, you will enjoy a fun, fast-paced environment and great teammates, as well as:
•
FREE Park Admission
•
FREE On-site Parking
•
Complimentary and Discounted Tickets for Friends & Family
•
Park discounts on food, merchandise, and in park experiences
•
Employee Referral Bonuses
•
Discounts on Food, Merchandise & Park Experiences
•
Exclusive Events & Attraction Previews
•
Attraction Share Program (Admission Vouchers for Local Partner Attractions)
•
and So Much More!
What it takes to succeed:
•
Minimum 16 years of age
•
Strong communication and interpersonal skills
•
Ability to maintain composure in stressful situations
•
Excellent multi-tasking abilities
•
Ability to train on and properly use protective gear
•
Ability to stand for entire shift
•
Comfortable working around water and animals
•
Ability to work indoors and outdoors in all weather conditions
•
Basic math skills desired
If you’re looking for an opportunity where you can make the most of your abilities, while working in a truly one-of-a-kind setting with an entertainment industry leader - You've Found It!!!
Join our team and you'll agree, the best careers are found at Sea!
Submit your application now

Private Events
Private Events
Group Tickets/Youth Events
Private Events at Aquatica
In addition to daytime group activities, Aquatica is also available for private events. Certain restrictions do apply, so call for details, or submit your Request for Proposal.
Request for Proposal
SeaWorld Events
Special Packages
Day or Nights Group Events
An event at Aquatica® is more than memorable. It's an immersive delight for the senses that will have your attendees singing its praises all the way back to the office and beyond.
Aquatica day or night events vary from:
• Reserved areas providing exclusive access for your group.
• Package pricing including dining options, parking, and admission.
You can customize your own group event to include a variety of options that will cater to you, please contact us by submitting a Request For Proposal.
Request For Proposal
Aquatica Exclusive Buyout
Your guests will cut loose, unwind, and enjoy the night air while mingling and networking at Aquatica, which is theirs exclusively for the evening. The party kicks into high gear the minute they step off the bus as they choose from exciting thrill rides, pools, plus great food and drink served at convenient locations throughout the Park. Your event can be customized with entertainment, enhancements, and branding opportunities that will recognize sponsors or valued clients. Aquatica will make your event the one to top in years to come.
To book a park buy out, please contact us by submitting a Request For Proposal.
Request For Proposal
Special Occasion Package
What's included:
Admission
One Time Meal (entrée, side or dessert, drink) at Banana Beach
Reserved seating at Tassie's Twisted Cove
$74.99 per person for Groups 15 - 25
Groups
over 25
should reach out to
[email protected]
Inquire about a Special Occasion Package
Catering & Entertainment
Catering
Our talented Culinary team is dedicated to producing high-quality catering meals. In addition to our Catering Menus, our Chef is happy to customize choices to accommodate special requests. From buffets to plated meals, outside cookouts to receptions with stations, our goal is to work with you to ensure that every guest has a delicious and satisfying culinary experience at your event.
Entertainment
Customize your event with entertainment. Choose from a variety of options, including walk-around performers, high-energy bands or DJ's, Island Trio, Jazz Band, caricature artists and much more.

Aquatica Orlando Special Events
AquaGlow
Select Nights, May 16 - Sept. 27, 2025
An electrifying family-friendly nighttime swim party that will transform the whole park into a neon paradise.
Learn More
Beach Nights
Select Nights, Oct. 25 - Dec. 20, 2025
Grab your popcorn and enjoy Holiday favorite films under a starry sky!
2026 Events
Aloha to Summer
March - May 2026
Say “Aloha” to summer with games, dance parties and exclusive food & beverage offerings!
AquaGlow
May - September 2026
An electrifying family-friendly nighttime swim party that will transform the whole park into a neon paradise.
The Ultimate Playdate
April - August 2026
You're invited to The Ultimate Playdate! Delight in early access to Turi’s Kid Cove before the park officially opens, so you and your little ones get a head start on the fun-filled adventure that awaits.
Pass Member Slide Nights
A Pass Member Exclusive Event! Enjoy culinary offerings and special priced guest tickets!
ALL-NEW Event for 2026!
Beginning in October
More information soon!
Buy a 2026 Fun Card
Get a 2026 Fun Card now and get unlimited visits for 2025 & 2026!
Buy Now
Events are subject to change.

Prices Starting at

Select Date
Groups of 15+ can enjoy one-day admission with a All-Day Dining Deal. Eat & drink once every 90 minutes for one low price.
All tickets are now date specific and valid for one visit to Aquatica Orlando on the date selected at time of purchase.
Meal includes one entrée, one side item or dessert, and a regular sized non alcoholic fountain drink at participating restaurants.
Children under 3 do not require a ticket for entry.
Minimum group size of 15 and maximum of 99 can be purchased per transaction.
Must be purchased as a group of 15 or more.
All-Day Dining Deal allows you unlimited visits to each participating restaurant until published restaurant closing once every 90 minutes. Adults can redeem 1 entree', 1 side OR 1 dessert & 1 regular sized non-alcoholic beverage. Children (Ages 3-9) can redeem kids meals. Wristbands MUST be worn at all times and shown at each redemption. Sharing and take out is prohibited. Menu and prices are subject to change without notice. No refunds on day of use. Refundable any time prior to the day of park visit. Park admission is required, but not included. Lost or Stolen tickets will not be replaced. Not redeemable for cash. This ticket expires (day indicated on purchase). Ticket void if altered.
Show more

Youth Events
Youth Group Tickets
Bring your school, scout or youth group to SeaWorld to experience up-close animal encounters, thrilling rides and world-class shows, all at a special rate.
• A minimum of 15 paid youth admission tickets (ages 3 - 12th Grade)
• Order form & payment must be sent to Group Sales 2 weeks prior to visit
• Group tickets much be purchased prior to visiting the park.  Tickets will not be available for purchase at the front gate.
• One complimentary chaperone ticket offered for every ten paid youth tickets.
Call
407-965-3251
or email
[email protected]
to purchase tickets.
